air:Brand.Name: Economy Value
air:Brand.air:Title: Economy Value
ECO VALUE
air:Brand.air:Text:
'Economy Value includes:
• Hand baggage 1 x 7kgs • Checked baggage included • Changes permitted • Refunds permitted • Onboard Meals and refreshments included • Seat selection (Exit Seat and Advance Seat Reservation)
Please refer to fare rules for full conditions • Please note that if the flight is operated by another airline then the onboard product or service maybe different to that described above.

air:OptionalService.air:Text: Special Meal

Pre-order preferred meal from our extensive menu before 48 hours prior to departure on selected UL flights departing from CMB. To book a special meal refer EMD Services for more details or call our contact centre 1979 (International: +94 777 771979) or our ticket offices.
